translation.en: [Young men] Do it, do it, do it, do it, do it!
[Security] Hey, stop right there!
[Security] Down! Now!
[Woman] Getting expelled from one elite private school!
translation.ko: 명문 사립학교에서 한 번 쫓겨나는 건

translation.en: Hey, it happens.
Getting expelled from two, that takes talent.
Summer, can you see why your mother's upset?
I told her months ago I didn't like it there.
translation.ko: 학교 싫다고 몇 달 전에 말했어요

translation.en: Pardon my French, but the kids were garbage.
As opposed to the criminals she spends time with now.
She doesn't even know them.
I know that you are the only one who got caught.
Maybe it's time you faced reality Margot, school isn't the best environment for me.
translation.ko: 마고, 현실을 받아들여 학교는 나랑 안 맞아

translation.en: Well you're in luck there because there's no decent school that's going to take you.
translation.ko: 다행이구나, 번듯한 학교들은 모두 널 거부해서

translation.en: And to do this to me, now! Oh did Margot tell you the good news?
translation.ko: - 하필 이 시기에 이래야겠어? - 마고한테 얘기 들으셨어요?

translation.en: Our award winning photographer over here got a gig in the Middle East.
translation.ko: 수상도 하신 사진작가님이라 중동에 일이 생기셨대요

translation.en: West Asia! It's more accurate to say West Asia.
Congratulations.
[Margot] Thank you. It's exciting.
I'm sure...
...and what's going to happen to Summer?
Hello. [Margot] Abbie?
Ahh, yeah. [Margot] Holy cow Abby, it's Margot.
Margot!? You're still on the same number?
Yes, same number at the same house.
How are you?
[Margot] Good, great, yeah I mean you know me,
translation.ko: 그럼! 아주 잘 있어 알다시피 늘 정신없이 살지만…

translation.en: too much on my plate but ahh...
...how's Thommo? It's been forever.
[Abbie] About a decade I'd say.
[Margot] No, has it really been 10 years?
What do you think you're doing?
Can't put me on a plane if I don't have any clothes.
translation.ko: 옷도 없이 비행기에 실어 보내진 못하겠지

translation.en: Seriously, do not.
[Man] Hey! Whoo!
So, you're going to think I'm crazy
but I need a huge, huge favour, and you're the first person I thought of.
translation.ko: 정말 어려운 부탁 하나 할게 네가 제일 먼저 생각나더라

translation.en: You're the last person she thought of.
So anyway, what are you guys up to for the next couple of months?
translation.ko: 앞으로 두어 달 동안 무슨 일정 있니?

translation.en: Read my lips Margot.
There is no way that I'm going to live with virtual strangers,
translation.ko: 난 모르는 사람들이랑 절대 같이 안 살아

translation.en: on the other side of the freaking world.
♪ Never took your side Never cursed your name ♪
She looks extremely cool.
Anything look familiar?
I left when I was four, not a lot of memories being formed.
translation.ko: 난 4살 때 이사 가서 기억나는 게 없어

translation.en: Summer darling, what do you need first? Food? Shower? Sleep?
translation.ko: 서머, 제일 필요한 게 뭐니? 음식? 샤워? 잠자리?

translation.en: I'd settle for a signal. I have zero bars.
You only get signal at Reception Point.
Honey, black-shouldered kite.
How do you feel about bird watching? It's surprisingly cool.
So there's a big competition here this weekend, Summer.
That's why Ari couldn't be out at the airport to meet you.
translation.ko: 아리가 그것 때문에 공항에 못 나온 거야

translation.en: Are you into surfing?
-Uh-uh. -Yes!
translation.ko: - 서핑 좋아해? - 아니 다행이다! 이 동네에선 다들 서핑 얘기만 하거든

translation.en: That's all anybody talks about in this town.
translation.ko: 다행이다! 이 동네에선 다들 서핑 얘기만 하거든

translation.en: [Commentator] Things are about to kick off here at the Shorehaven Pro Juniors.
translation.ko: 쇼어헤이븐 프로 주니어 대회가 곧 시작됩니다

translation.en: Over the next two days, the very best young surfers
on this circuit will battle it out as they start their quest
translation.ko: 최고의 기량을 자랑하는 어린 서퍼들이 앞으로 이틀간의 경쟁을 통해

translation.en: for the selection on the state team.
[ukulele music] The sun's poking through and Huey has delivered clean, three foot swells.
So, it is on!
Hey, Marlon.
Sorry about your heat.
Up against Ahmed.
He's definitely going to smoke you, but no offence.
I mean, you've been out for a year.
I don't know. Rehab's been pretty intense. Heaps of upper body work.
translation.ko: 그동안 재활 열심히 했어 상체 운동 장난 아니었고

translation.en: Just, no surfing.
translation.ko: - 근데 서핑을 안 했지 - 브레이크는 내가 더 잘 알아

translation.en: He doesn't know the break like I do.
translation.ko: - 근데 서핑을 안 했지 - 브레이크는 내가 더 잘 알아 브레이크는 변해

translation.en: But the break's changed, man.
The bank moved. It works at a high tide now.
translation.ko: 이젠 뱅크가 이동해서 만조 때 해야 한다고

translation.en: Everything's different.
But hey, good luck.
[Abbie] Did we bring any bags? [Honey] I put them in the boot.
translation.ko: - 우리 가방 가져왔나? - 제가 트렁크에 넣었어요

translation.en: Ah thanks, love.
With any luck, Ari's going to be finished by the time we get back from the shops.
translation.ko: 내가 돌아올 때까지 아리 경기가 끝나면 좋겠네

translation.en: See you soon.
So, Reception Point.
Big hill, end of the car park.
I don't know if you remember, but I used to take you and Ari there
translation.ko: 기억할지 모르겠지만 너랑 아리가 어릴 때

translation.en: when you were little tackers to whale watch.
translation.ko: 나랑 같이 고래 보러 다니던 곳이야

translation.en: [Honey] We can all go together.
Yeah, that sounds great, but I'm just making some calls.
translation.ko: 그것도 좋은데 난 그냥 전화만 하면 돼

translation.en: Back soon.
Sorry! Sorry!
Are you okay?
Maybe...
...if concussion doesn't take me in the night.
You're American.
Yeah, I've been consigned here, like an old timey, British convict.
translation.ko: 옛날 영국 죄수처럼 여기로 쫓겨 왔어

translation.en: Staying with this family I haven't seen since forever.
translation.ko: 백만 년 만에 재회한 사람들이랑 지내라네

translation.en: Wouldn't be the Gibsons?
It's a small town. Everyone kind of knows everyone.
Well, from what I can tell so far,
the mum is strung tighter than a violin.
Daughter's from outer space,
and the dad reminds me of the homeless men who talk to pigeons in Central Park.
translation.ko: 아빠는 센트럴파크에서 비둘기랑 얘기하는 노숙자 같아

translation.en: Haven't met the son yet, but on the evidence, he'll definitely be somewhere on the loser spectrum.
translation.ko: 아들은 아직 못 만났는데 분명 루저일 거야

translation.en: Definitely.
[Commentator] Attention heat three, 15 minute warning.
That's me.
I'll see you around, Summer.
Hey, how do you know Ari?
Oh, crap.
[Commentator] The swell has just picked up in time for the Boys Under 16.
translation.ko: 16세 미만 남자 부문 경기에 맞춰 파도가 치고 있네요

translation.en: Heat three is Casey, Phillips, Ahmed,
and Shorehaven's own, Ari Gibson.
Gibson's gills are dry after a year out with injury.
First competition back. Let's see what he brings to the party.
Here we go. Phillips in red, makes the first move.
This guy has technique to burn.
Gibson in gold, Ahmed in green, yet to post scores.
translation.ko: 금색의 깁슨과 녹색의 아메드 아직 우위를 알 수 없어요

translation.en: Gibson does well, he's in the right spot. Ahmed pounces.
translation.ko: 깁슨, 위치가 좋아요 아메드, 치고 나옵니다

translation.en: Gibson's just wrapped that up in a bow and given it away.
translation.ko: 깁슨이 파도를 놓쳤군요 아메드가 기회를 잡았습니다

translation.en: [Commentator] Gibson's not looking very comfortable out there. Hope it's not that injury troubling him.
translation.ko: 깁슨이 어딘가 불편해 보이네요 부상 때문이 아니길 바랍니다

translation.en: So how long you staying? Well according to my mum, about six weeks.
According to the flights I'm about to book with her credit card, 24 hours.
translation.ko: 난 엄마 카드로 비행기 예매해서 24시간 뒤에 떠날 거야

translation.en: But do the Gibsons know you're leaving? No, no, it's one of those secret evil plans.
translation.ko: - 너 가는 거 깁슨 가족도 알아? - 아니, 못된 비밀 계획이거든

translation.en: That's pretty weird.
Poppy, it's not weird. It's like the journey she's on.
translation.ko: 포피, 이상할 것 없어 얜 자기 갈 길을 가는 거야

translation.en: Anyway, every second I stand here is a second I'm not in New York, so.
translation.ko: 여기 오래 있을수록 뉴욕엔 늦게 돌아가는 거니까

translation.en: Hey, if you're only staying one night, there's a party at Poppy's place.
translation.ko: 서머, 내일 갈 거면 오늘 포피네 파티에 와

translation.en: Bod, she just said she wants to leave.
It'll be fun. And Ari can come to.
translation.ko: 재미있을 거야 아리랑 같이 와도 돼

translation.en: If he wants. Oh, I get it.
You're using me to get to him.
No, he's just a really good friend of ours.
But, he's been keeping to himself lately.
Well, I'll probably be super jet lagged, but thanks for the invite.
translation.ko: 난 시차 때문에 힘들 것 같아 초대해 준 건 고마워

translation.en: Got to go climb a hill. Good luck.
If the wind's right, you should get 4G.
Well, if I never see you guys again, have amazing lives.
translation.ko: 미리 인사해 둘게 행복하게 잘 살아

translation.en: [Commentator] Casey takes off, upping the speed.
Oh, great precision on that top turn.
And oh, sticks the landing.
Let's see what the judges have to say.
6.8 for Casey. Puts him into second place behind Ahmed.
Only the top two surfers in the heat will advance to the next round
translation.ko: 상위 2인만 다음 라운드에 진출할 수 있죠

translation.en: and there's barely a minute left on the clock.
Gibson with priority, but he is being very chosey out there.
translation.ko: 깁슨에게 우선권이 있는데요 선뜻 선택을 안 하네요

translation.en: Looks like he might let this one go.
But no, Gibson, the dark horse, has come to claim it after all.
Gibson's found himself the best wave of the set,
translation.ko: 이번 세트에서 가장 좋은 파도를 차지했어요

translation.en: and he really needs to nail this.
Do what you need to do?
Totally.
Oh uh Summer, this is my brother Ari.
Think you're pretty clever, don't you?
I have my moments.
Was my room.
Now your room.
Rustic.
The bed's more comfy than it looks and the sheets are new.
Well not new, but you know, we washed them.
Oh, actually I was going to take that down,
but she's actually a really good surfer.
Bet she's super talented.
Definitely not. We said one competition and that is it.
translation.ko: 절대 안 돼 대회는 한 번만 나가기로 했잖아

translation.en: I've already missed a year. If I miss another one, I'll never catch up.
Half my friends are already sponsored--
The same friends who stopped coming around
translation.ko: - 친구들은 스폰서를 구해서… - 걔들이 친구니? 네가 서핑 못 하게 되니까 코빼기도 안 비치더라

translation.en: when you couldn't surf anymore.
translation.ko: 네가 서핑 못 하게 되니까 코빼기도 안 비치더라

translation.en: Summer? Go to bed.
Mate, why don't we just keep free-surfing? All right, keep it simple.
translation.ko: 서핑은 취미로 하면 돼 그럼 편하고 좋잖아

translation.en: Comps, sponsorship, all that stuff can wait.
translation.ko: 대회나 스폰서 같은 건 나중에 생각해도 돼

translation.en: It can't. If I want a career, it can't.
translation.ko: 이 길로 나가려면 지금 생각해야 해요

translation.en: This is about my future.
Your future is exactly what we're thinking about.
A whole season of competition is too much strain for your body.
translation.ko: 시즌 내내 대회를 뛰는 건 네 몸엔 무리야

translation.en: What's Summer going to do, just follow you around from beach to beach?
translation.ko: 그동안 서머는 뭐 해? 해변으로 널 따라다녀?

translation.en: Why not? She might be into it.
Has anyone thought that Summer might want to hang out with me instead?
translation.ko: 서머는 저랑 노는 걸 더 좋아할지도 몰라요

translation.en: Summer. Hey, come on. Off to bed.
-All right. -Come on. Maybe just a quick nap.
We'll sleep on it. That means no.
It means we'll sleep on it.
Sorry. I'm finished.
Yeah, no rush.
Oi!
Wait up. What are you doing?
Checking out this party, your friend Bodhi invited me.
You too actually.
Bodhi specifically said I could come?
Except she wasn't frothing at the mouth like that.
What about my folks? Did they say we could?
I don't need permission from your parents.
translation.ko: 난 네 부모님한테 허락 안 받아도 돼

translation.en: But you're a good kid who does what he's told, even when his dreams are being crushed.
translation.ko: 하지만 넌 꿈을 짓밟혀도 말을 잘 듣는 착한 애니까

translation.en: So you should stay.
Just wait, wait.
Let me get some pants.
Oh, okay.
I can work with this.
Okay, thanks.
Because of course you have a crush on the wannabe influencer.
Oh, you barely know her.
All right, go on then. Show us your moves.
translation.ko: 그렇다 쳐, 이제 어떻게 할 거야?

translation.en: Summer, you made it!
[Summer laughs] Hey, hey, yeah.
Hey Ari, sick comeback today.
Nah, I just got lucky with that last wave and...
Yeah, so that happened.
Hey, I have to show you something.
Your mum is Margot Torres.
You didn't tell us you're from surfing royalty.
translation.ko: 서핑 귀족 가문 출신이란 거 왜 말 안 했어?

translation.en: [Summer laughs] Don't get too excited.
Anyway, is there anyone who could give me a ride to the airport tomorrow?
translation.ko: 내일 나 공항에 태워다 줄 사람 있어?

translation.en: The airport?
Pretend you didn't hear that.
No one else from Shorehaven has ever gotten on the tour.
translation.ko: 쇼어헤이븐에서 그 투어에 진출하신 유일한 분이야

translation.en: She's kind of a legend.
And you should never meet your heroes.
Why do you need to go to the airport? To go back to New York, dummy.
So I don't have to follow you around everywhere.
Anyway, this is a crazy boring conversation.
Do I need to teach you people how to party?
Come on. [Summer laughs]
Can't stay much longer, okay? I've got finals in the morning.
translation.ko: 난 곧 가야 해 아침에 결선 경기가 있어

translation.en: I don't.
Yo. Do not try this at home.
Let me hear you! Come on, let's go!
translation.ko: 더 크게 질러 봐! 소리 질러!

translation.en: Yeah, make some noise!
Come on! Let's go!
Oi!
Oh, off the balcony, into the half pipe and then finish with a sick 540.
It's easy. No, it's insane.
Look, if you want to get on a plane tomorrow, whatever,
but if you break your neck tonight, I'm grounded for life.
translation.ko: 하지만 오늘 네 목이 부러지면 난 평생 서핑 금지야

translation.en: And how would that be different to your current situation?
translation.ko: 지금도 별로 다르지 않은 것 같은데?

translation.en: Yo! If she wants to do it man, let her do it.
Let's go!
Yo, give that back. I will if you promise not to jump.
Right now.
[Abbie] Sneaking out on Summer's first night here,
translation.ko: 서머가 온 첫날 밤에 몰래 빠져나가다니

translation.en: I can't believe you've put me in this position.
I'm sorry, you're grounded.
[Ari] Mum, I'm in the quarters tomorrow, I have to be there.
[Abbie] You should've thought about that before you snuck out.
translation.ko: 나가기 전에 그 생각을 하지 그랬니?

translation.en: Summer's here all by herself, she doesn't know anyone.
translation.ko: 서머는 이 동네에 아는 사람이 하나도 없어

translation.en: You need to set an example.
[Ari] I didn't ask her to come.
[Abbie] Well she's here now, so deal.
I'm going to bed.
Okay, looks like you've got it covered. Got a plane to catch.
translation.ko: 너 혼자도 충분하겠네 난 비행기 타러 가야 해

translation.en: You're not seriously going through with it, are you?
Here's the thing, Ari.
I always go through with it.
What about your big finals thing? Huh?
That's what grounded usually means.
Just copy and paste my plan and sneak out.
And being a massive rebel has worked out so well for you.
translation.ko: 너도 그렇게 반항하다가 여기까지 온 거잖아

translation.en: At least I don't just roll over when something gets in my way.
translation.ko: 난 장애물이 생긴다고 바로 포기하진 않아

translation.en: At least I try.
Hey Dad?
It's a New Holland honeyeater.
Hey um, my shoulder was hurting yesterday.
I just thought I'd let you know that
when I finished my heat, it was hurting.
But then the physio said it might always hurt,
and that it might just be something I have to get used to.
I appreciate that.
And I'm sorry that your mum and I aren't as relaxed as what we used to be but...
translation.ko: 예전처럼 느긋하게 지켜봐 주지 못하는 건 미안하다만…

translation.en: ...you almost died a year ago, mate.
You can't expect us to just forget that and move on.
translation.ko: 나랑 네 엄마 입장에선 예민해질 수밖에 없다고

translation.en: No, and I don't.
translation.ko: 그걸 이해 못 하는 게 아니에요

translation.en: But when I was in hospital going through rehab,
this is all I thought about.
Getting back in the water, competing again.
translation.ko: 다시 물에 들어가고 경기를 할 생각으로 버텼어요

translation.en: That's what got me through it.
Ah, well.
We did promise you one comp so,
may as well make good on it, hey?
[Commentator] Welcome to finals day people.
Huge day ahead, so do not leave town.
translation.ko: 굉장한 날이 될 테니 멀리 가지 마세요
